ygData.subject: Re: Bards and Everquest books.
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I would like to recommend that you start at the Bard s Guild at http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/ This site has tons of recommendations for books, music
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:10 PM 5/25/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: "GRENON, DANIEL" <daniel.grenon@...>
>
>Hi fellow Bards,
>
>I was wondering if any of you got any good suggestions for books
>about Bards that would be Everquest like? And some books about
>Everquest in general too would be fun to read. I never read a Fantasy
>book or played a fantasy game (but tons of sci-fi), so I'm new with this
>
>genre I would like to start with light stuff not too complicated.

I would like to recommend that you start at the Bard's Guild at
http://amtgard.pinkpig.com/bards/
This site has tons of recommendations for books, music and games, all
relating to Bards.

Enjoy!
Talies the Wanderer
